name: Twitch.tv - Dark / Black / Customisable Theme
description: Style is pretty dead, use FrankerFacez. Advanced options within it has most of the same options as offered by this userstyle as well as a number of things CSS alone couldn't reliably offer. A customisable dark / black / white / gray interface for twitch.tv. Contains font options, icon hiding, etc. Please note that due to this style having settings it will not in fact automatically update. Check back in if Twitch breaks or if it's been a while since you updated.
